item.title: Rachel add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "It is not fair to ask of others what you are not willing to do yourself." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Rachel add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Kate Griffin
Rachel add a quote by Laurel Thatcher Ulrich
item.description: "Well-behaved women seldom make history." -- Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Kristin Cashore
item.description: "I'm not going to wear a red dress," she said. "It would look stunning, My Lady," she called. She spoke to the bubbles gathered on the surface of the water. "If there's anyone I wish to stun at dinner, I'll hit him in the face." -- Kristin Cashore

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Lauren Oliver
item.description: "Maybe you can afford to wait. Maybe for you there's a tomorrow. Maybe for you there's one thousand tomorrows, or three thousand, or ten, so much time you can bathe in it, roll around it, let it slide like coins through you fingers. So much time you can waste it. But for some of us there's only today. And the truth is, you never really know." -- Lauren Oliver

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Lauren Oliver
item.description: "The flip side of freedom is this: When you're completely free, you're also completely on your own." -- Lauren Oliver
